articles.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, 'Cosby Show' actor, dies at 54 in Costa Rica drowning
articles.description: Actor Malcolm-Jamal Warner, best known for his role as Theo Huxtable on "The Cosby Show," has died at the age of 54 after a drowning incident in Costa Rica. Warner was a beloved figure for many who grew up watching the show.

articles.title: Bangladesh students protest after air force jet crash into school kills 31
articles.description: A Bangladeshi air force training jet crashed into a school in Dhaka, killing at least 31 people, including many students. The incident has sparked protests by students demanding answers and improved safety measures.

articles.title: Trump pulls US out of UN cultural agency UNESCO for second time
articles.description: The Trump administration has announced that the United States will withdraw from the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) for the second time. The administration cited concerns of an anti-Israel bias within the organization.
